text:
InComm | Portland, Atlanta, Salt Lake City | Software Engineer | ONSITE | Full Time | https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/search?ss=1&searchKeyw...

InComm is hiring for many positions. We're in the stored value product industry (think gift cards), and many other financial products.

I work out of the Portland office where we use C#, AngularJS, RabbitMQ, and SQL Server. Building out APIs to integrate a wide variety of customers and third parties. Free lunch and breakfast once a week, located downtown, free parking or TriMet pass. Free snacks and hackathons once a year. Great atmosphere and opportunity to grow.

Database engineer - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5769/database-engineer... Manager, software engineering - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5275/manager%2c-softwa... Desktop support technician - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5478/desktop-support-t...

Also many Java software engineering jobs in Atlanta and other areas:

SQL Server DBA - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5729/sql-server-dba/jo... Software Engineer, III - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5716/software-engineer... Enterprise Security Engineer - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5683/enterprise-securi... Solutions Engineer, Dynatrace - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5506/solutions-enginee... Associate Software Engineer - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5493/associate-softwar...

Software Engineer III (Salt Lake City) - https://careers-incomm.icims.com/jobs/5563/software-engineer...

Email rfaaberg at incomm.com if you're interested!
